body_content.explanation: that relates to the relationship between members of a group of people or a family:
examples: Relational learning focuses on how teachers and students can learn together.
Any relational considerations need to be put aside when deciding on the future running of the company.

body_content.explanation: that forms or describes a connection between things:
examples: There is no relational link between these two parts of the website.
He designed a relational database to keep track of the stock.
